ygData.subject: RE: Song mixing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Shinara! Those quick icon spots correspond to the number keys 1-6.  Its usually easier to keep track if you keep your fingers on the number corresponding
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Shinara!

Those quick icon spots correspond to the number keys 1-6. Its
usually easier to keep track if you keep your fingers on the number
corresponding to the next song to start. At least that's what I do.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: shinara@... [mailto:shinara@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:21 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Song mixing


From: shinara@...

First of all thanks to all those that replied to my mail. I am now running
around Steamfont in Black Gear with Bronze boots and helm, still no gloves.
I was overwelmed with all the positive responces, my boyfriend said I would
get flamed.

Now to the question, I have tried to blend more than 2 songs together and
kepp getting hit and forgetting where I am until one icon dissapears, is
there an easy way to see what is about to run out or an easier way to mix
songs apart from in the quick icon spot on the bottom left ?

Answers in private please, most know how to do this.

Ta
Shinara
